lyrics.stanza: Father, Son and Holy Ghost, One in Three, and Three in One, As by the celestial host, Let Thy will on earth be done; Praise by all to Thee be giv'n, Glorious Lord of earth and heav'n!
Vilest of the sinful race, Lo, I answer to Thy call: Meanest vessel of Thy grace, Grace divinely free for all; Lo, I come to do Thy will, All Thy counsel to fulfil.
If so poor a worm as I, May to Thy great glory live, All my actions sanctify, All my words and thoughts receive; Claim me for Thy service, claim All I have, and all I am.
